description:
There will be a Nordic Perl Workshop in Oslo next year, and everyone's welcome!

Wait! There's more!

NPW will be part of the first Nordic Open Source Developers Conference! We're planning lots of cool stuff, and everyone's welcome!

Did I mention, everyone's welcome?

Yes they are.

Oh, and there's more, but for that you'll have to listen to Salve J. Nilsen (Oslo.pm) share details at this lightening talk. :)
title: Nordic Perl Workshop 2015
